king 'weather - maker' - had to keep schedule to mantain cosmic order. Supervised 1st plowing of season.

sports arenas (Auboyer 1965: 125); gladiatorial combat, animal fights (Smith 1923: 78); Racing of chariots on 6000 yd. course. Much betting.
water holding [underlined]; artificial pools. No mention of material. Wells mentioned (Basham 1963: 204-205); mentioned (Majumdar 1960: 341)

for swearing oath falsely (Majumdar 1960: 242); Varuna punishes for violations of utoc, or social order. Does not explicitly say within lifetime but punishment in afterlife is not inflicted personally by gods in Hinduism. And says ‘merciless punishments' (Drekmeier 1962: 40-42)
